short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace all the cartoony images on Duolingo with Becky G!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you want to improve your language learning experience? When learning a language on Duolingo, cartoony images will be used in various places such as when selecting a level, for certain questions and during loading screens. Install this extension to replace these images with a random image of Becky G, a near fluent speaker of Spanish! 

Options are provided to configure which images get replaced.
This extension does not collect any personal information and is not affiliated with Duolingo.
